Class Controller

java.lang.Object

it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<Notification>
public class Controller
extends Observable<java.lang.String>
implements Observer<Notification>
Controller for Game.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Function to notify all client about current Game State and to start Game

    • filter

      private void filter​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String functionName, java.lang.String data)
      This function is used to filter requests, if the Game State is changed all client will be notified with the new State through a createReport() function
      Parameters:
      username - player username
      functionName - function name to use
      data - to use for the function

    • splitter

      private void splitter​(FuncCommand command, java.lang.String data)
      This function is used to parse and check input data from user, and then run the command
      Parameters:
      command - Function to Launch
      data - Data to use in the Function

    • createReport

      private void createReport​(java.util.ArrayList<Command> report)
      Create and Send to Client current Game State
      Parameters:
      report - initial report state

    • infoOnPhase

      private java.util.ArrayList<Command> infoOnPhase​(GamePhase phase)
      Create an ArrayList of setup Command from current GamePhase
      Parameters:
      phase - Current Game Phase
      Returns:
      if there is any data to be added based on Current Phase will be returned, otherwise an empty arraylist will be returned
